faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to questions you may encounter during use

format.question: What subtitle file formats are supported?
format.answer: Currently supports SRT format subtitle files, which is the most commonly used subtitle format with the best compatibility. We plan to support more formats like ASS, VTT in future versions.

languages.question: What languages can be translated between?
languages.answer: Supports mutual translation between 8 mainstream languages including Chinese, English, Japanese, French, German, Spanish, Russian, and Italian, meeting most users' needs.

quality.question: How is translation quality guaranteed?
quality.answer: We use advanced translation technology from Google Cloud and OpenAI, specially optimized for subtitle content to ensure translation accuracy and fluency. Multiple translation engines are available for your choice.

privacy.question: Are my files secure?
privacy.answer: We take user privacy very seriously. File transmission uses HTTPS encryption, translation process occurs in a secure cloud environment, files are automatically deleted after translation, no user data is stored.

cost.question: Is there a cost to use this?
cost.answer: Completely free! No account registration required, no paid subscription, no usage limits. We are committed to providing free subtitle translation services to users worldwide.

speed.question: How long does translation take?
speed.answer: Translation speed depends on file size and selected translation service. Generally, normal length subtitle files (100-500 lines) can be completed within 1-3 minutes.
